General.Name: West Vault Mining
General.Description: West Vault Mining Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold projects in the United States. Its flagship property is the Hasbrouck property located in Nevada. The company was formerly known as West Kirkland Mining Inc. and changed its name to West Vault Mining Inc. in July 2020. West Vault Mining Inc. was founded in 2009 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A6
